CustomField.formula: if( text( Sales_Order__r.Ware_House__r.City__c) == 'Kolkata', 'PPLCU'+RIGHT(text(YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))), LEN(text(YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)))) - 2)+'GDNT'+RIGHT( Name , LEN(Name) - 4),if( text(Sales_Order__r.Ware_House__r.City__c) == 'Gurugram', 'PPLHO'+RIGHT(text(YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))), LEN(text(YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)))) - 2)+'GDNT'+RIGHT( Name , LEN(Name) - 4),'Please select Place on supply on SO.'))
CustomField.label: Delivery Note Number
